title: About
text:
This is a personal website I am making for [STAT 37815: Practical R Programming with Extensions](https://stat.uchicago.edu/academics/course-info/2024-2025-cour ses/autumn-2024-stat-37815-1/) with [Dr.Â McShane](https://ryanmcshane.com).
The website is designed to showcase my work and projects in R programming, as well as other personal and academic endeavors. I plan to update it periodically as I complete new projects and learn additional skills. This platform will serve as a portfolio to highlight my growth in programming and statistical analysis.

title: Home Page
text:
About me
My name is Dingyu Guo, and I am a first-year M.S. student in Statistics at the University of Chicago. I graduated from Boston University in 2024 with a passion for Sports Analytics and Statistics. I am excited to merge my technical skills and enthusiasm for sports to uncover new insights and contribute to the field of analytics.
